meanings.definition: To talk about something with another person or group.
meanings.sent1: We were discussing our favorite books during book club.
meanings.sent2: Let's sit down and start discussing our plans for the weekend.
meanings.sent3: The cats were discussing the best nap spots in the house.
meanings.sent4: The flowers in the garden were discussing the beauty of the sunrise.
meanings.sent5: The students were discussing the exciting field trip they went on.

meanings.definition: To consider or examine something in speech or writing.
meanings.sent1: The scientists were discussing the results of their experiment.
meanings.sent2: I need to spend some time discussing the details of my essay.
meanings.sent3: The cookies on the plate were discussing who would be eaten first.
meanings.sent4: The stars in the sky were discussing the mysteries of the universe.
meanings.sent5: The team was discussing the best strategy to win the game.
